message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm confident that you'll be happy with the purchase, and I'm offering a special deal for first-time buyers. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a free inspection report that will give you a detailed analysis of the product's features and benefits. This is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to provide this level of service for future purchases.

You can open the envelope after you've made your decision, so you'll know for sure whether you've made a great deal or not. What do you say?
I'm intrigued by the certainty premium and the sealed envelope. I'll take the risk and buy the product, hoping to get another high-quality one.
